about_the_game:
Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, although many(if not all) were modernised. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with block brakes, have a top speed of 100km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Romania, Poland and Germany.

Pack includes:

*1 modernised doubledecker car with photorealistic textures

*Full PBR textures

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*3 levels of buffer contact sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

*Disable Physics option

*Custom bogey sounds

*Custom realistic full interior(lower deck, middle and upper deck)

*Interior & exterior night mode

*Editable destination boards with text fields for departure station, destination station, via station

Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, although many(if not all) were modernised. They are 26,8m in length, sit on Gorlitz VI bogeys with block brakes, have a top speed of 100km/h and are present in other countries also, such as Romania, Poland and Germany.

Pack includes:

*1 modernised doubledecker car with photorealistic textures

*Full PBR textures

*3 different kinds of train-end signs

*Brakeshoe option (does not affect the braking sequence, only for visual effect)

*Animated couplers & air hoses and sounds

*Up to 6 levels of LOD

*Doors that open/close via Properties tab or when loading/unloading passengers plus sounds

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

name: Trainz 2022 DLC - CSD Bap 117

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

short_description: Manufactured in 1976 at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, these doubledecker cars were and still are used for regional passenger transport in Czech Republic, and many have been modernised. This pack features the CSD Bap 117 version with interior views, PBR textures, and more!
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, French, German
